parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ requestId: $json.requestId, userId: $json.userId, message: `[VERTICAL:cold-outreach] Build outreach sequence for ${$json.phaseA.targetRole} at ${$json.phaseA.companyProfile}. Hook: ${$json.phaseA.resultStatement}`, classification: { pmoOffice: 'marketing-office', director: 'Boomer_CMO', departmentalAgent: 'Social Campaign Agent', executionLane: 'deploy_it' }, verticalContext: $json.phaseA, executionSteps: $json.execution.steps, source: 'n8n-vertical-cold-outreach' }) }}
